 2019-02172019-03-25FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActExcise Act, 2001
SubjectExcise Duties on Cannabis Regulations
PrecisEXCISE DUTIES ON CANNABIS REGULATIONS in order to (1) formalize and give legal effect to the decision of provinces and territories to joint the coordinated cannabis taxation framework; and (2) provide that cannabis products that are test kits or reference standards are relieved from the excise duty framework on cannabis products.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0078 Publication Date: 2019-04-03
AttachmentsAttachment
